function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Algorithm 1 based on randomly placing circles in a rectangular domain","Impact":"Overlap of circles may lead to spatial congestion and increase the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement a correction procedure to ensure that circle centers are inside the domain, and adapt the algorithm to accommodate different domain types","Technologies":"Geometric optimization algorithms, spatial layout algorithms","People":"Occupants, visitors, and staff in the built environment","Owner":"Designers, architects, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Optimization problem for arranging chairs in a rectangular room","Impact":"Sub-optimal arrangement may lead to crowded spaces and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Use optimization algorithms to find an optimal arrangement with prescribed distances between chairs, avoiding spatial congestion","Technologies":"Quadratically constrained nonlinear optimization algorithms, spatial layout algorithms","People":"Occupants, visitors, and staff in the built environment","Owner":"Interior designers, facility managers, and event organizers"}]}
